promos.title: TG Long #1
promos.text:
🚀 Welcome to LaunchCommand — your crypto command centre.

Every project launch needs structure, hype, and speed. With LaunchCommand you get:
• Copy-paste promo threads
• Shiller raid stacks
• Sticker packs for instant branding
• FAQs, Roadmaps, Terms & Privacy in one place

⚡ Make your launch professional from day one.
👉 Try it now: https://launchcommand.app
Bot: @LaunchCommandBot | Channel: https://t.me/LaunchCommand
